user_instruction: 'Respond to Sarah'"'"'s email about the "Quantum Cohesion 2023" retreat. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Follow-up on “Quantum Cohesion 2023” Retreat

Hi John,

Could you please have a look at my recent email about the “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat and send over your feedback at your earliest convenience? All of the background notes and the latest planning doc are in your Gmail and our Notion workspace if you’d like to reference them.

Thanks a lot for helping us keep things moving!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
